Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/recovery

What you'll find here: rescue disk images and tools for creating rescue disks

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

images/
various rescue images

fspace.tgz (LSM entry) 1996-12-13
prints out basic information regarding the amount of free space on a filesystem (2513 bytes)

the mkfs equivalent for romfs filesystem (17510 bytes)
